query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
1 Ora sen va per un secreto calle, 2 tra ’l muro de la terra e li martìri, 3 lo mio maestro, e io dopo le spalle.
query.error: **English:** 1 Now he goes by a secret path, 2 between the wall of the city and the martyrs, 3 my master, and I behind his shoulders.
query.result: 1 Adyaiva sa gacchati guhyena panthā, 2 Nagarasya prākāra eva ca śahidāḥ ca madhye, 3 Mama guruḥ, aham ca tasya pṛṣṭhataḥ.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
4 «O virtù somma, che per li empi giri 5 mi volvi», cominciai, «com’ a te piace, 6 parlami, e sodisfammi a’ miei disiri.
query.error: **English:** 4 "O supreme virtue, who through the steep hills 5 turned me back," I began, "as is pleasing to you, 6 speak to me, and satisfy my desires.
query.result: 4 "He parama śreṣṭha, yaḥ durgeṣu giriṣu 5 mama pratibodhanaṃ cakāra", aham ārabhya uvāca, "yat te rocate, 6 mama vāñchāḥ pūrṇaya, mama praśnānām uttaram dehi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
7 La gente che per li sepolcri giace 8 potrebbesi veder? già son levati 9 tutt’ i coperchi, e nessun guardia face».
query.error: **English:** 7 Can the people who lie in the tombs 8 be seen? Already all 9 the lids are lifted, and no guard is watching.
query.result: 7 Ye janāḥ samādhiṣu śayante 8 Te kim dṛṣṭum śakyante? Sarve 9 Patākāḥ udghāṭitāḥ santi, na ca ko'pi rakṣakaḥ asti.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
10 E quelli a me: «Tutti saran serrati 11 quando di Iosafàt qui torneranno 12 coi corpi che là sù hanno lasciati.
query.error: **English:** 10 And those to me: "All will be gathered 11 when they return here to Jehoshaphat 12 with the bodies that they left up there."
query.result: 10 Te ca mama: "Sarve samāgatāḥ bhavanti 11 Yada Jehoshaphat iha punar āgacchanti 12 Śarīraiḥ taiḥ yeṣām upari tyaktāni santi."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
13 Suo cimitero da questa parte hanno 14 con Epicuro tutti suoi seguaci, 15 che l’anima col corpo morta fanno.
query.error: **English:** 13 Their cemetery have on this side 14 with Epicurus all his followers, 15 who make the soul die with the body.
query.result: 13 Asya śmaśānam asmin pakṣe asti 14 Epicureṇa saha tasya sarve anugāminaḥ, 15 Ye jīvam śarīreṇa saha mṛtam manyante.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
16 Però a la dimanda che mi faci 17 quinc’ entro satisfatto sarà tosto, 18 e al disio ancor che tu mi taci».
query.error: **English:** 16 But as to the demand that you make of me, 17 here within you shall soon be satisfied, 18 and also as to the desire that you keep silent about to me."
query.result: 16 Tathāpi yāṃ pṛcchāṃ mama karṣi, 17 atraiva tatkṣaṇāttvam tṛptaḥ bhaviṣyasi, 18 evaṃ ca yāṃ kāmaṃ mama na vakṣyasi."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
19 E io: «Buon duca, non tegno riposto 20 a te mio cuor se non per dicer poco, 21 e tu m’hai non pur mo a ciò disposto».
query.error: **English:** 19 And I: "Good leader, I do not keep hidden 20 from you my heart, except to say little, 21 and you have not only now disposed me to this."
query.result: 19 Aham ca: "Sādho netā, na tvayā guhyam 20 mama hṛdayam vinā kvacit alpam vaktuṃ, 21 tvam ca na adya eva mama etat prati anugrahaḥ kṛtaḥ."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
22 «O Tosco che per la città del foco 23 vivo ten vai così parlando onesto, 24 piacciati di restare in questo loco.
query.error: **English:** 22 "O Tuscan, who through the city of fire 23 go thus speaking so honestly, 24 may it please you to remain in this place.
query.result: 22 He Tuṣāra deśīyaḥ yaḥ agni nagarāt 23 jīvanḥ evaṃ satyavacanīyena gacchasi, 24 atra sthāne sthitaḥ bhavitum tava rocate.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
25 La tua loquela ti fa manifesto 26 di quella nobil patrïa natio, 27 a la qual forse fui troppo molesto».
query.error: **English:** 25 Your speech reveals you 26 to be from that noble fatherland 27 to which perhaps I was too harsh.
query.result: 25 Tava vāṇī tvāṃ prakāśayati 26 Tasyās tu janmabhūmeḥ āryāyāḥ, 27 Yasyāṃ aham kimcid atiriktatapo 'bhūvam.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
28 Subitamente questo suono uscìo 29 d’una de l’arche; però m’accostai, 30 temendo, un poco più al duca mio.
query.error: **English:** 28 Suddenly this sound came forth 29 from one of the arches; therefore I approached, 30 fearing, a little closer to my guide.
query.result: 28 Āścaryeṇa ayam śabdaḥ nirgataḥ 29 Ekataḥ toraṇānām; atas aham upapannaḥ, 30 Bibhyan, alpameva adhikaṃ mama netṛṇaḥ.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
31 Ed el mi disse: «Volgiti! Che fai? 32 Vedi là Farinata che s’è dritto: 33 da la cintola in sù tutto ’l vedrai».
query.error: **English:** 31 And he said to me: "Turn around! What are you doing? 32 See Farinata there, who has risen up: 33 from the waist up, you will see him all."
query.result: 31 Sa ca mama avocat: "Parivartaya! Kim karoshi? 32 Paśya tatra Farinātam yaḥ samutthitaḥ asti: 33 Kaṭyāḥ ūrdhvam samagram enam drakṣyasi."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
34 Io avea già il mio viso nel suo fitto; 35 ed el s’ergea col petto e con la fronte 36 com’ avesse l’inferno a gran dispitto.
query.error: **English:** 34 I had already set my face toward its depths, 35 and it rose up with its chest and forehead 36 as if it held Hell in great contempt.
query.result: 34 Aham adhunā mama vaktram tasya gahane sthāpitavān, 35 Sa ca stanena eva lalāṭena ca utthitaḥ, 36 Yathā narakāya atiśayaṃ dveṣaḥ syāt.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
37 E l’animose man del duca e pronte 38 mi pinser tra le sepulture a lui, 39 dicendo: «Le parole tue sien conte».
query.error: **English:** 37 And the noble and ready soul of the leader 38 pushed me among the tombs toward him, 39 saying, "Your words are worthy of note."
query.result: 37 Evaṃ ca śūraḥ satvaraśca netā 38 Mām apīḍayat sma śmaśāneṣu tasya, 39 Vadamānaḥ, "Tava vacāṃsi śravaṇīyāni."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
40 Com’ io al piè de la sua tomba fui, 41 guardommi un poco, e poi, quasi sdegnoso, 42 mi dimandò: «Chi fuor li maggior tui?».
query.error: **English:** 40 As I stood at the foot of his tomb, 41 he looked at me for a moment, and then, almost disdainfully, 42 he asked me: "Who were your greatest ancestors?".
query.result: 40 Yathā aham tasya samādheḥ pādayoḥ āsīt, 41 Sa mahyam alpaṃ dṛṣṭvā, tataḥ kimcid avajñayā, 42 "Ke tava pūrveṣu śreṣṭhāḥ āsīt?" iti papraccha.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
46 poi disse: «Fieramente furo avversi 47 a me e a miei primi e a mia parte, 48 sì che per due fïate li dispersi».
